price: 48. Ha adeecin gaalada iyo munaafiqiinta, oo dan ha u gelin hadalkooda dhibta leh, iskuna hallee Alle oo talo saaro, Allena ku Filan xafide uu ahaado iyo wakiil.
arabic: وَلَا تُطِعِ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ وَٱلۡمُنَٰفِقِينَ وَدَعۡ أَذَىٰهُمۡ وَتَوَكَّلۡ عَلَى ٱللَّهِۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ وَكِيلٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: walā tuṭiʿi al-kāfirīna wal-munāfiqīna wadaʿ adhāhum watawakkal ʿalā al-lahi wakafā bil-lahi wakīlan
